instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.6 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.jdt.apt.core,org.eclipse.core.runtime Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Version: 2.0.22 Export-Package: com.javadude.annotation;uses:="com.sun.mirror.apt",com.javadude.annotation.processors Bundle-SymbolicName: com.javadude.annotation;singleton:=true Bundle-ClassPath: .,lib/velocity-dep-1.5.jar Bundle-Name: JavaDude Annotation Plugin Bundle-Vendor: JavaDude.com

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: This project suppies two types of dynamic working sets: * PrefixWorkingSet - a working set that automatically adds projects based on a name prefix * NatureWorkingSet - a working set that automatically adds projects based on their project natures

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: This project suppies two types of dynamic working sets: * PrefixWorkingSet - a working set that automatically adds projects based on a name prefix * NatureWorkingSet - a working set that automatically adds projects based on their project natures

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: This project supplies Java 5 annotations to generate the following: * JavaBean code (properties, event sets) * Method delegation * Simple equals, hashcode and toString methods * Cloneable implementation * Null Object implementations * Interface extraction

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: This project supplies Java 5 annotations to generate the following: * JavaBean code (properties, event sets) * Method delegation * Simple equals, hashcode and toString methods * Cloneable implementation * Null Object implementations * Interface extraction

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: This project suppies two types of dynamic working sets: * PrefixWorkingSet - a working set that automatically adds projects based on a name prefix * NatureWorkingSet - a working set that automatically adds projects based on their project natures

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: This project supplies Java 5 annotations to generate the following: * JavaBean code (properties, event sets) * Method delegation * Simple equals, hashcode and toString methods * Cloneable implementation * Null Object implementations * Interface extraction

property.value: This project suppies two types of dynamic working sets: * PrefixWorkingSet - a working set that automatically adds projects based on a name prefix * NatureWorkingSet - a working set that automatically adds projects based on their project natures
